section.heading: Defense to sexual abuse.
section.text: Consent by the victim is a defense to a prosecution under §§ 22-3002 to 22-3006, prosecuted alone or in conjunction with charges under § 22-3018 or §§ 22-401 and 22-403.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 18-88 deleted “defense, which the defendant must establish by a preponderance of the evidence,” following “defense”.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
